alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 11 at 11:46AM PST until March 12 at 4:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches between 7000 and 9000 feet. 1 to 2 feet expected above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wet snow will result in heavy loads on roofs, possibly leading to collapses.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
